doc:
Michael Wilding (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Wilding_(actor) 0 Michael Charles Gauntlet Wilding (23 July 1912 – 8 July 1979) was an English stage, television, and film actor. He is best known for a series of films he made with Anna Neagle, for the two films he made with Alfred Hitchcock and for being Elizabeth Taylor's second husband. Michael_Charles_Gauntlet_Wilding ( 23_July_1912 – 8_July_1979 ) was an_English_stage , television , and film_actor . He is_best_known for a_series of films he made with Anna_Neagle , for the_two_films he made with Alfred_Hitchcock and for being Elizabeth_Taylor 's_second_husband .
